name: My Mother is a Caravan?
description:
Hi! This is a game developed by my friends and I, in a team of 8 for Ludumdare 46 Game Jam. It was developed from scratch in 3 days, 72 hours. It is based on the theme "Keep it Alive". The player's mother was turned into a caravan and he has to find a way to keep her alive, with his only option being to get help from the wizard at a price of 1000 gold.

NOTE: Please play this game in full screen mode!
